question_text: Which TWO differences distinguish PCI from PCIe technology? (Select two)
answer_options: PCIe supports more devices per bus
PCIe uses serial communication with lane scalability
PCI supports more total bandwidth per card
correct_answer: PCIe supports more devices per bus
PCIe uses serial communication with lane scalability
explanation: PCIe allows greater scalability and performance through lane-based serial communication and point-to-point architecture.
